content: What science fiction television show follows the adventures of Captain Jean-Luc Picard and his crew aboard the starship USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D)?

The science fiction television show you're referring to is "Star Trek: The Next Generation." It is set in the 24th century and follows the adventures of Captain Jean-Luc Picard and his crew aboard the starship USS Enterprise (NCC-1701-D). The series is part of the larger Star Trek franchise created by Gene Roddenberry and aired from 1987 to 1994.
